extendedInfo.description: âââ NEW TRIVIA QUIZZES âââTalking Angela will test your knowledge in the newly added trivia quizzes. To start a quiz, type any of these into the chat window: quiz, give me a quiz, start quiz.Join Talking Angela in Paris, the city of love and style! Wow her and treat her like a princess because letâs face it, she IS a princess. Chat with her, buy her presents and choose her wardrobe. You can even smile at her or show her your tongue (but thatâs no way to treat a lady)! She is not alone in the city though, you may see a familiar face pop up here and there but in a completely different role! âââ HOW TO PLAY âââ â Pet Talking Angela and she will be happy. â Use the "Gift" button to buy her drinks, accessories, clothes, makeup etc. â Use the "Heart" button and make Angela read you a fortune cookie. â Use the "Coat hanger" button to access Angela's wardrobe and change her appearance. â Use the "Face" button to open the front camera and communicate with Angela through face gestures (nod or shake your head, smile, yawn or show your tongue). âââ IMPORTANT âââ â The "Face" button doesn't exist on low-end devices (single core CPU) and on devices without a front facing camera.âââ HOW TO CHAT âââ â You can chat with Angela only in ENGLISH. â Press into the text field to start a conversation. â Use the keyboard to type OR use dictation. â Angela will answer with text and voice in English. â Start trivia quizzes by typing any of these commands into the chat window: quiz, give me a quiz, start quiz.â You can talk to Angela about a variety of subjects: love, dating, friends, school, fashion, celebrities, movies, music, TV, books, hobbies, food, travel, pets etc. â Use commands like: sing to me, tell me a joke, buy drink. Enjoy hours of fun with Angela! LEGAL NOTICE: We are collecting anonymized data log files containing details on the usage of the app. More details: http://outfit7.com/privacy/
